Spanish: Objetivos a tiro en la carretera.

English: Mission failed\nToo many enemy soldiers reached the base
French: Échec de la mission\nTrop de soldats ennemis ont rejoint la base
Spanish: La misión ha fracasado\nDemasiados enemigos llegaron a la base
Italian: Missione fallita\nTroppi nemici hanno raggiunto la base

French: SE CACHER PRÈS DE LA ROUTE
